synopsis.text: Shiori Katase, a petite yet captivating senior colleague, takes it upon herself to guide and nurture the newcomer, Takuma Shinozaki, at their workplace. As they spend more time together, Shinozaki finds himself drawn to Katase's radiant kindness and motherly charm, which extends to all their coworkers. But as their bond deepens, Shinozaki can't help but wonder if Katase's affectionate gestures hold a deeper meaning, or if they are simply part of her caring nature. Will Shinozaki discover the true intentions behind Katase's warm-hearted actions, or will he forever question the significance of their connection?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
